SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_UNAVAILABLECHILDREN_FOR_TRANSFERSPONSORSHIP_FROMITEMLISTXML
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Returns the paired list of unavailable children selected for a transfer/substitute Sponsorship, list is in XML
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL: create function dbo.USR_UFN_UNAVAILABLECHILDREN_FOR_TRANSFERSPONSORSHIP_FROMITEMLISTXML ( @ITEMLISTXML xml ) RETURNS TABLE AS RETURN ( SELECT T.c.value('(ID)[1]','uniqueidentifier') AS 'PROGRAMID', T.c.value('(NAME)[1]','nvarchar(100)') AS 'UNAVAILABLECHILDNAME', T.c.value('(LOOKUPID)[1]','nvarchar(50)') AS 'UNAVAILABLELOOKUPID', T.c.value('(TRANSFERCHILDNAME)[1]','nvarchar(100)') AS 'TRANSFERCHILDNAME', T.c.value('(TRANSFERLOOKUPID)[1]','nvarchar(50)') AS 'TRANSFERLOOKUPID', T.c.value('(TRANSFERCHILDID)[1]','uniqueidentifier') AS 'TRANSFERCHILDID' FROM @ITEMLISTXML.nodes('/CHILDREN/ITEM') T(c) )
